title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Enhancing Pre-Service Teachers' Skills via Blended MOOC Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: The learner distinguishes 3 main MOOC design types (content-based, community/task-based, network-based) and applies them to real-world cases.
In a blended learning environment, the learner can design strategies to improve learner engagement by 20% or more using formative assessment tools.
In a BYOD environment, the learner can integrate collaborative tools with an LMS (Learning Management System) to produce science education content.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
